summary:
Today's Fifty In 50 challenge question is:
What is or was your relationship with people from your parent's generation. 
As I was brought up in the late 50s early 60s, I think I come from a generation that still connected with their grandparents and parents in a different way, than most do today.  It was difficult to relate to them on one important level in that my parents generation went through the Second World War, a trauma the following generations can hardly grasp at...
title: Generational Thing

summary:

title: I wish I was more dedicated
